about.title: About DMV Exterminators
about.description: With over two decades of experience serving the DC Metropolitan area, DMV Exterminators has become the trusted name in pest control. Our commitment to using safe, effective methods and providing exceptional customer service has earned us the loyalty of thousands of satisfied customers.

history.title: Our Local Roots
history.description: Founded in 2005 in Rockville, Maryland, DMV Exterminators was born from a simple mission: to provide our local community with reliable, effective pest control solutions. Our founder, Carlos Marchena, recognized the unique pest challenges faced by homeowners and businesses in the DC Metro area and set out to create a company that truly understands and serves our local community.

mission.title: Our Mission & Values
mission.value1Description: We're not just a pest control company - we're your neighbors. We're committed to making our community a better place to live and work.
mission.value2Description: With 20+ years of experience in the DMV area, we understand the unique pest challenges of our region and how to solve them effectively.

serviceArea.title: Our Service Area
serviceArea.surrounding: And surrounding areas within 30 miles of Rockville

hero.title: Contact Our Team
hero.subtitle: Get in touch with DMV Exterminators for fast, reliable pest control solutions

area.title: Service Area
area.counties: Including DC, Montgomery, and Fairfax Counties

form.title: Request a Free Quote
form.description: Fill out the form below and our team will get back to you within 24 hours.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: Are the treatments safe for my family and pets?
faq.answer1: We prioritize the safety of your family and pets by using EPA-approved products and following strict application guidelines. Our technicians are trained to apply treatments in a manner that minimizes any potential risks.
faq.question2: Will the pests be completely eliminated?
faq.answer2: Our experienced technicians conduct thorough inspections to identify the source of the infestation and develop a targeted treatment plan. We are committed to completely eliminating the pests and will work with you to ensure your home is pest-free
faq.question3: How much will the service cost?
faq.answer3: We strive to offer high-quality pest control services at a competitive price point within the local market. The exact cost will depend on the type of pest, the size of the infestation, and the size of your property, so we recommend contacting us for a free, no-obligation quote.
faq.answer4: We do offer eco-friendly chemical services. We understand the importance of protecting the environment and offer a range of treatment options that utilize more environmentally conscious products. Our team can discuss these options with you to find the best solution for your needs.
faq.question5: How quickly can you respond to my pest problem?
faq.answer5: We understand that pest problems can be urgent and disruptive. Depending on our current schedule and the severity of the issue, we can often respond as soon as the same day or the next day. Please call us to discuss your specific situation, and we will do our best to schedule your service as quickly as possible.
faq.answer6: Our guarantee is built on our 20 years of experience and our commitment to effective pest control. We are confident in our ability to get rid of pests, typically within 3 visits or less. To ensure long-term pest prevention, we also offer preventative treatment plans tailored to your specific needs.

hero.title: General Pest Control Services

description.title: Comprehensive Pest Control Solutions
description.text: Are unwanted pests like ants, spiders, roaches, earwigs, and silverfish invading your space? Our general pest control services offer comprehensive solutions to identify, eliminate, and prevent these common nuisances. We use proven techniques and safe products to ensure a pest-free environment for your peace of mind.

treatment.title: Safe Treatment
treatment.text: We use products and methods that are safe for your family and pets.

hero.title: Bed Bug Control Services
hero.subtitle: Get Rid of Bed Bugs Quickly and Effectively in the DC Metro Area

description.title: Expert Bed Bug Elimination
description.text: Bed bugs can be a persistent and frustrating problem. DMV Exterminators offers specialized bed bug control services, including heat treatments and targeted chemical treatments, designed to eliminate these pests from your home or business in Montgomery County, Prince Georges County, Fairfax County, and Washington D.C. We understand the urgency and work discreetly to restore your comfort.

bites.title: Bite Marks
bites.text: Small, red, itchy welts in a line or cluster pattern on exposed skin.

blood.title: Blood Stains
blood.text: Tiny blood spots on sheets, pillowcases, or mattresses.

fecal.title: Fecal Spots
fecal.text: Dark, rust-colored spots on bedding, furniture, or walls.

odor.title: Musty Odor
odor.text: A sweet, musty smell in heavily infested areas.

travel.title: Travel Precautions
travel.tip3: Wash clothes in hot water after travel

secondhand.title: Secondhand Items
secondhand.tip1: Inspect used furniture before bringing home
secondhand.tip3: Consider professional inspection of large items

cta.title: Need Bed Bug Treatment?
cta.text: Contact us today for a free inspection and customized treatment plan.

hero.title: Termite Control Services
hero.subtitle: Protecting Your Property from Costly Damage in the DC Metro Area

description.title: Expert Termite Protection
description.text: Termites can cause significant structural damage to homes and businesses in our region. DMV Exterminators provides expert termite control services, including thorough inspections to detect infestations, effective treatments using liquid and baiting systems, and preventative measures to safeguard your property in Montgomery County, Prince Georges County, Fairfax County, and DC. Don't wait until it's too late – protect your investment today.

inspection.title: Comprehensive Inspection
inspection.text: Thorough examination of your property to identify termite activity and potential entry points.

treatment.title: Advanced Treatment
treatment.text: Utilizing treatments and proven systems for maximum effectiveness.

prevention.title: Preventative Care
prevention.text: Ongoing monitoring and maintenance to prevent future infestations.

mudTubes.title: Mud Tubes
mudTubes.text: Small tunnels made of mud on foundation walls or in crawl spaces.

hollowWood.title: Hollow Wood
hollowWood.text: Wood that sounds hollow when tapped or appears damaged.

swarmers.title: Swarmers
swarmers.text: Winged termites or discarded wings near windows or doors.

frass.title: Frass
frass.text: Termite droppings that resemble sawdust or coffee grounds.

cta.title: Protect Your Property Today
cta.text: Schedule a free termite inspection and get a customized treatment plan.

hero.title: Rodent Control Services
hero.subtitle: Humane and Effective Removal in Montgomery County, Prince Georges County, Fairfax County, and DC

description.title: Expert Rodent Removal
description.text: Mice, rats, and voles can be more than just a nuisance; they can carry diseases and cause damage to your property. Our rodent control services focus on humane and effective removal of these pests, followed by preventative strategies to keep them from returning to your home or business in the DMV area.

inspection.title: Thorough Inspection
inspection.text: Comprehensive assessment to identify entry points and nesting areas.

removal.title: Humane Removal
removal.text: Using safe and ethical methods to remove rodents from your property.

prevention.title: Prevention
prevention.text: Implementing long-term solutions to prevent future infestations.

disease.title: Disease Transmission
disease.text: Rodents can carry and transmit various diseases through their droppings and urine.

allergens.title: Allergens
allergens.text: Rodent dander and droppings can trigger allergies and asthma attacks.

damage.title: Property Damage
damage.text: Rodents can chew through wires, insulation, and structural elements.

food.title: Food Contamination
food.text: Rodents can contaminate food supplies and preparation areas.

entry.title: Seal Entry Points
entry.tip1: Inspect your property for gaps and holes
entry.tip2: Seal cracks in foundation and walls
entry.tip3: Install door sweeps and weather stripping

cleanliness.title: Maintain Cleanliness
cleanliness.tip2: Regularly clean up crumbs and spills

landscape.title: Landscape Management
landscape.tip3: Keep firewood stored away from structures

cta.title: Need Help with Rodents?
